column5: Is Hidden Island still in business I heard Don sold out are the new owners going to run it as a camp? Do they have a web site?
Is Hidden Island still in business I heard Don sold out are the new owners going to run it as a camp? Do they have a web site?

Don sold out, new owners took over last fall. I talked with them at, I believe, the All-Canada show in Des Moines. They own a resort on the American side of LOW, seem to be nice folks. I can't find the info, will look later.

Don sold out, new owners took over last fall. I talked with them at, I believe, the All-Canada show in Des Moines. They own a resort on the American side of LOW, seem to be nice folks. I can't find the info, will look later.
Talked to Don last summer, and he was sad to go. But, it was time. The new couple own a hotel I was told.

Thanks for the info I stayed there several times and liked Don and his camp, I hope he is doing OK
